sentence: It's RINO Brian Kemp,? a recent Perdue ad says.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: George Soros Company': Electric Vehicle Plant Deal Emerges as Flashpoint in Georgia Governor's Race

sentence: Late last year, the leadership of the Republican Governors Association faced a vexing question: What should the group do about conservative governors, like Brian Kemp of Georgia, who were facing relentless attacks from Donald Trump?
title: Tucker, Thiel and Trump: How J.D. Vance won in Ohio.
